Sentencas: For solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) systems fueled by kerosene, reforming of methane, ethylene, and desulfurized kerosene was investigated over Ni-8YSZ catalyst at 750 degrees C and steam-to-carbon ratio (S/C) = 3 as a function of gas hourly space velocity (GHSV).
Titulo: Reforming of methane, ethylene, and desulfurized kerosene over Ni-8YSZ catalyst

Sentencas: At temperatures higher than 650 degrees C, a thick Ni-8YSZ layer exhibited a high catalytic activity for reforming of methane, ethylene, and kerosene of which gas concentration in a pre-reformate gas was less than 1%.
Titulo: Reforming of methane, ethylene, and desulfurized kerosene over Ni-8YSZ catalyst

Sentencas: On the other hand, thin anode layer will require some modification of the catalytic activity.
Titulo: Reforming of methane, ethylene, and desulfurized kerosene over Ni-8YSZ catalyst

Sentencas: Carbon was formed as particles in the inlet quartz wool via pyrolysis of ethylene at flow-stagnation points, which will cause pore closure in Ni-anode catalysts.
Titulo: Reforming of methane, ethylene, and desulfurized kerosene over Ni-8YSZ catalyst

Sentencas: This type of carbon formation would bring about inhomogeneous flow-and-voltage distribution in a cell.
Titulo: Reforming of methane, ethylene, and desulfurized kerosene over Ni-8YSZ catalyst

Sentencas: Direct feed of steam and kerosene to Ni-8YSZ was examined at GHSV = 2400 h(-1), 1, S/C = 3 and 550-750 degrees C. Gas composition analysis and FTIR spectra indicate that high kerosene conversion (>= 95%) could be attained at 650-750 degrees C over Ni-8YSZ assuming relatively thick Ni-anode layer.
Titulo: Reforming of methane, ethylene, and desulfurized kerosene over Ni-8YSZ catalyst

Sentencas: The catalytic activity was deteriorated at lower temperatures.
Titulo: Reforming of methane, ethylene, and desulfurized kerosene over Ni-8YSZ catalyst

Sentencas: Clear carbon deposition on Ni-8YSZ or inlet quartz wool was not observed on the experimental condition.
Titulo: Reforming of methane, ethylene, and desulfurized kerosene over Ni-8YSZ catalyst

Sentencas: The direct feeding system may be possible only at high temperatures and high S/C. As long as a temperature of anode-supported SOFCs is kept over 650 degrees C, small amount of methane, ethylene, and kerosene will not harm performance of the SOFCs.
Titulo: Reforming of methane, ethylene, and desulfurized kerosene over Ni-8YSZ catalyst
